description: Every time a new bot is invited to give it a role manually is annoying. Let raven do it for you!
roleSet: {emotes.success} | {role} is now automatically given to newly invited bots
roleRemoved: {emotes.success} | {role} is no longer given to newly invited bots
list:
{emotes.success} | The following roles are given to newly invited bots:

{emotes.arrow} | {list}
noList:
{emotes.success} | The following roles are given to newly invited bots:

{emotes.arrow} | No roles
noAutorole: {emotes.error} | This role is not a bot auto role
